languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s augurs scan the area for favourable tactical positions. While the flagship is in such a position, its {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} is increased by +35%.
Duration: 2 rounds +1 round for every 20 points in the Master of Etherics's Awareness skill.
languages.original_text:
Авгуры сканируют пространство в поисках таких выгодных тактических позиций, где {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}уклонение{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}флагмана{/g} увеличится на 35%.
Продолжительность: 2 раунда +1 раунд за каждые 20 очков навыка Наблюдательность у офицера на посту.

Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Master of Etherics's Awareness skill.

traits.locale_text: Авгуры сканируют пространство в поисках таких выгодных тактических позиций, где Уклонение флагмана увеличится на +35%.

languages.text:
Die Auguren des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} suchen das Gebiet nach günstigen taktischen Positionen ab. Während sich das Flaggschiff auf einer solchen Position befindet, ist sein {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Ausweichen{/g} um +35 % erhöht.
Dauer: 2 Runden +1 Runde für jede 20 Punkte in der Fertigkeit Achtsamkeit des Meisters der Ätherik.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s augurs scan the area for favourable tactical positions. While the flagship is in such a position, its {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} is increased by +35%.
Duration: 2 rounds +1 round for every 20 points in the Master of Etherics's Awareness skill.

traits.locale_text: Die Auguren des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} suchen das Gebiet nach günstigen taktischen Positionen ab. Während sich das Flaggschiff auf einer solchen Position befindet, ist sein {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Ausweichen{/g} um +35 % erhöht.

Die Auguren des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} suchen das Gebiet nach günstigen taktischen Positionen ab. Während sich das Flaggschiff auf einer solchen Position befindet, ist sein {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Ausweichen{/g} um +35 % erhöht.
Dauer: +1 Runde für jede 10 Punkte in der Fertigkeit Bewusstheit des Meisters der Ätherik.

languages.text:
Les augures du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} scrutent la zone à la recherche de positions tactiques avantageuses. Dans une telle position, l'{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évitement{/g} du bâtiment augmente de +35 %.
Durée : 2 rounds + 1 round par tranche de 20 points de la compétence Vigilance du maître des éthers.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s augurs scan the area for favourable tactical positions. While the flagship is in such a position, its {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} is increased by +35%.
Duration: 2 rounds +1 round for every 20 points in the Master of Etherics's Awareness skill.

traits.locale_text:
Les augures du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} scrutent la zone à la recherche de positions tactiques avantageuses. Dans une telle position, l'{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évasion{/g} du bâtiment augmente de +35 %.
Durée : 2 rounds + 1 round par tranche de 20 points dans la compétence Vigilance du maître des éthers.

Les augures du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} scrutent la zone à la recherche de positions tactiques avantageuses. Dans une telle position, l'{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évasion{/g} du bâtiment augmente de +35 %.
Durée : 2 rounds + 1 round par tranche de 20 points dans la compétence Vigilance du maître des éthers.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}使用俄歇矩阵扫描整片区域，寻找有利的战术位置。当旗舰处于该有利位置时，{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}闪避{/g}会提高35%。
持续时间：两轮，声讯大师每有20点警觉技能，持续时间延长一轮。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s augurs scan the area for favourable tactical positions. While the flagship is in such a position, its {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} is increased by +35%.
Duration: 2 rounds +1 round for every 20 points in the Master of Etherics's Awareness skill.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}使用俄歇矩阵扫描整片区域，寻找有利的战术位置。当旗舰处于该有利位置时，{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}闪避{/g}会提高35%。
持续时间：两轮，声讯大师每有20点警觉技能，持续时间延长一轮。

languages.text:
Los augures de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} pueden analizar la zona en busca de posiciones tácticas favorables. Mientras la nave insignia esté en una de esas posiciones, su {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasión{/g} aumenta un +35 %.
Duración: 2 asaltos +1 asalto por cada 20 puntos de Atención del Maestro etérico.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s augurs scan the area for favourable tactical positions. While the flagship is in such a position, its {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} is increased by +35%.
Duration: 2 rounds +1 round for every 20 points in the Master of Etherics's Awareness skill.

traits.locale_text:

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}のスキャナーが、有利な戦術的位置を求めてエリアをスキャンする。旗艦がその位置にいる間、{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}回避{/g}が+35%増加する。
持続時間：2ラウンド。魂の主の認識力スキル20ごとに+1ラウンド。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s augurs scan the area for favourable tactical positions. While the flagship is in such a position, its {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} is increased by +35%.
Duration: 2 rounds +1 round for every 20 points in the Master of Etherics's Awareness skill.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}のスキャナーが、有利な戦術的位置を求めてエリアをスキャンする。旗艦がその位置にいる間、{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}回避{/g}が+35%増加する。
持続時間：2ラウンド。魂の主の認識力スキル20ごとに+1ラウンド。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Sancak gemisinin{/g} alametleri, elverişli taktiksel konumlar için alanı tarar. Sancak gemisi, böyle bir konumdayken {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}sıyrılma{/g} değeri +%35 artar.
Süre: 2 raunt ve Eter Ustası'nın Farkındalık yeteneğindeki her 20 puan için +1 raunt.
